example.text: House Republicans’ Child Deportation Act will do nothing but strip protections for unaccompanied minors, disrupt our economy, and effectively end asylum in the US If the GOP was serious about securing the border they'd work with Democrats to pass meaningful, humane reforms.

While I would hope that House Republican leadership would recognize the harm caused by the Charleston loophole and would bring this bill to the floor for a vote, this discharge petition would make that happen even if they remain unwilling. With strong support in the Democratic Caucus, we just need a handful of Republican colleagues willing to put partisanship aside and do the right thing for the American people.

Their actions ought to serve as an example to other organizations dedicated to the wellbeing of service members, their families, and the preparedness of our military. Our great state and Nation are safer as a result of Charleston County Sheriff's Office's commitment to these service members.

Defaulting on our debt would be catastrophic for the American people. So would capitulating to MAGA Republican hostage-taking. Whether it be by Executive Order or a clean debt limit bill, we must ensure the United States pays our debts like we always have. [[url]]

As the first woman of color confirmed to serve as [[user]]' chief trade negotiator and advisor, [[user]] has become a critical figure in the administration. This #AANHPIHeritageMonth, we sat down to discuss her historic role and the future of trade. [[url]]

House Republicans’ Child Deportation Act will do nothing but strip protections for unaccompanied minors, disrupt our economy, and effectively end asylum in the US If the GOP was serious about securing the border they'd work with Democrats to pass meaningful, humane reforms.
